ausf.software.containers

Class AudioData

  • java.lang.Object
    • ausf.software.file.Audio
      • ausf.software.containers.AudioData

  • public class AudioData
extends Audio
    Implementation of a container object for convenient transportation of audio data for subsequent processing.

    Each instance of AudioData stores information about the data compression format, the number of audio channels, the number of bytes transmitted per second of playback, the number of bytes for one sample, the number of bits in the sample

    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Shcherbina Daniil
    See Also:
    Audio

    • Constructor Detail

      • AudioData

        public AudioData(short audioFormat,
                 short numChannels,
                 int sampleRate,
                 int byteRate,
                 short blockAlign,
                 short bitsPerSample,
                 byte[] data)
        Creates an instance with the existing audio data
        Parameters:
        audioFormat - data compression format registration index
        numChannels - number of audio channels
        sampleRate - audio sample rate
        byteRate - the number of bytes transferred per second of playback
        blockAlign - the number of bytes for one sample
        bitsPerSample - the number of bits in the sample
        data - an array of audio data bytes
